answerText: James Fenimore Cooper[10] Cooper is perhaps most famous for writing this novel, one of his "Leatherstocking Tales," in which Uncas and Cora are killed before Hawkeye shoots Magua.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 11 | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man sued Park Benjamin Jr. for libel over claims that his account of the Battle of Lake Erie was inaccurate. For 10 points each: [10] Name this American author whose "Literary Offenses" were compiled by Mark Twain.
